tool_description:
Find profanities and offensive words from any text.

The JSON API that helps you filter profanity and bad words in your reviews, chat, or any text.

Supported Languages:

 - English
 - French
- Spanish (coming soon)
- Italian (coming soon)

Many more are coming...
name: Profanity Buster
title: Profanity Buster

api_list.name: /profanities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://profanity-buster.p.rapidapi.com/profanities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "profanity-buster.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://profanity-buster.p.rapidapi.com/profanities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "profanity-buster.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
